body_html:
real_path() addition is sort of irrelevant to this change, but when experimenting I discovered a bug in build pip package. If I ran build_pip_package script with a relative path, the whl file just got lost. I wanted to fix that in this PR.
Would you like me to move it to a new PR?
body_text:
real_path() addition is sort of irrelevant to this change, but when experimenting I discovered a bug in build pip package. If I ran build_pip_package script with a relative path, the whl file just got lost. I wanted to fix that in this PR.
Would you like me to move it to a new PR?
body:
real_path() addition is sort of irrelevant to this change, but when experimenting I discovered a bug in build pip package. If I ran build_pip_package script with a relative path, the whl file just got lost. I wanted to fix that in this PR.
Would you like me to move it to a new PR?
